com.bluecreation.melodysmart

Class MelodySmartDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bluecreation.melodysmart.MelodySmartDevice

  • public class MelodySmartDevice
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class for accessing the core functionalities of the MelodySmart library.

      • MelodySmartDevice

        public MelodySmartDevice()

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(android.content.Context context)
        Initializes the MelodySmart library. The applications should initialize the library always before it is accessed in any way, apart from calling getInstance(). The library will use the input Context argument to access some Android services.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context the library will use to query Android services

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(MelodySmartListener listener)
        Registers a new MelodyListener that will get notified about MelodySmart events. If the listener is null or has previously been registered, nothing happens
        Parameters:
        listener - The new listener to register

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener(MelodySmartListener listener)
        Removes MelodyListener that will stop being reported about MelodySmart events. If the listener is null or has not been previously registered, nothing happens
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(BondingListener listener)
        Registers a new BondingListener that will get notified about bonding events If the listener is null or has previously been registered, nothing happens
        Parameters:
        listener - The new listener to register

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener(BondingListener listener)
        Removes a BondingListener that will stop being reported about bonding events. If the listener is null or has not been previously registered, nothing happens
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(OtauListener listener)
        Registers a new listener that will be notified about OTAU events. If the listener is null or has previously been registered, nothing happens
        Parameters:
        listener - The listeer to register

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener(OtauListener listener)
        Removes an OtauListener that will stop being reported about OTAU events. If the listener is null or has not been previously registered, nothing happens
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove

      • getInstance

        public static MelodySmartDevice getInstance()
        Gets a handle to the MelodySmart library. The first time that instance is retrieved it should followed by a call to init(android.content.Context).
        Returns:
        A handle to the MelodySmart library

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String btAddress)
        Tries to a remote bluetooth device. on success is reported on MelodySmartListener.onDeviceConnected()
        Parameters:
        btAddress - The bluetooth address of the remote device

      • startOtau

        public void startOtau(OtauRelease release)
        Starts OTAU in a remote MelodySmart device and downloads the new MelodySmart image in fwData to the device.

      • isOtauAvailable

        public boolean isOtauAvailable()
        Queries whether the connected remote MelodySmart device supports OTAU and it is already available, which can happen some seconds after connecting to the device. Will always return false if called before the callback MelodySmartListener.onOtauAvailable() is issued.
        Returns:
        true if OTAU is available on the remote device. False, otherwise.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Drops the connection with a remote bluetooth device. After disconnection, application is reported by means of MelodySmartListener.onDeviceDisconnected(BLEError) ()} ()}

      • close

        public void close(android.content.Context context)
        Closes the MelodSmart library handler instance. In order to properly release the resources the library might use, it should be called before the Android application is destroyed.
        Parameters:
        context - The context the library will run on.

      • getXtalTrim

        public java.lang.Integer getXtalTrim()
        The value of the XtalTrim parameter read from the remote device. May return null before the callback MelodySmartListener.onOtauAvailable() is issued.
        Returns:
        The value XtalTrim if read or null otherwise.

      • getDeviceVersion

        public java.lang.String getDeviceVersion()
        The version of MelodySmart running on the remote device. May return null before the callback MelodySmartListener.onOtauAvailable() is issued.
        Returns:
        The MelodySmart version in the remote devi

      • startLeScan

        public void startLeScan(android.bluetooth.BluetoothAdapter.LeScanCallback mLeScanCallback)
        Start scanPendingCallback for remote BLE devices. Results are reported using the BluetoothAdapter.LeScanCallback.onLeScan(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice, int, byte[]) callback.
        Parameters:
        mLeScanCallback - The callback where results are reported

      • stopLeScan

        public void stopLeScan(android.bluetooth.BluetoothAdapter.LeScanCallback mLeScanCallback)
        Stops scanPendingCallback for remote BLE devices. Results are reported using the BluetoothAdapter.LeScanCallback.onLeScan(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice, int, byte[]) callback.
        Parameters:
        mLeScanCallback - The callback where results are reported

      • readRemoteRSSI

        public void readRemoteRSSI()

        The data service

        Returns the service associated to that MelodySmart remote device
        Returns:

        Returns the Battery service associated to that MelodySmart remote device
        Returns:

      • getDeviceInfoService

        public DeviceInfoService getDeviceInfoService()
        Returns the device info. service associated to that MelodySmart remote device
        Returns:
        The device info. service

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(int[] address)
        Converts a bluetooh address encoded in a String into an array of integers
        Parameters:
        address - The input address
        Returns:

      • removeBond

        public boolean removeBond()
        Tries to remove the bonding information on the Android phone.
        Returns:
        Whether bonding information was successfully removed or not.

      • isBonded

        public boolean isBonded()
        Checks whether the Android phone is bonded with the Melody Smart device.
        Returns:
        whether the Android phone is bonded with the Melody Smart device.

      • readDeviceVersion

        public void readDeviceVersion()
        Reads the firmware version on the remote Melody Smart device. Result is provided by means of the OtauListener.onDeviceVersionRead(int, int, int) callback. Only works if the Melody Smart is in BootMode.BOOT_MODE_APP mode. Otherwise, nothing happens.

      • getBootMode

        public com.bluecreation.melodysmart.BootMode getBootMode()
        Returns the BootMode the Melody Smart device is in.
        Returns:
